title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave, indigo dyed, resist applied with stencil (katazome)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 148 x 33 cm (58 1/4 x 13 in.)
Repeat H: 33 cm (13 in.)
description: Large chrysanthemums in off-set repeat, one row facing up and the other down, with curled and dotted stems. In ivory on an indigo blue ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 19th century.
19th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave, indigo dyed, resist applied with stencil (katazome). Gift of Elinor Merrell. 1973-29-36.
